content: Swiss insurance giant ACE Ltd  will buy upmarket property insurer Chubb Corp  for $28.3 billion to get access to wealthy clients who pay higher premiums at a time when fierce competition has cut deeply into the industry's profit margins. | Video

title: ACE buys upmarket Chubb in biggest ever insurance takeover
